answerText: triple point[10] This formula states that the number of degrees of freedom equals the number of components minus the number of phases plus two.

question: Question: Answer some questions about phase diagrams, for 10 points each: [10] This is the point on a phase diagram in which the compound exists as a solid, liquid, and gas all at the same time.
